lemma exec_heap_read_typed: "(ta, xcphfrs') \<in> JVM_heap_base.exec addr2thread_id thread_id2addr spurious_wakeups empty_heap allocate (\<lambda>_ :: 'heap. typeof_addr) (heap_base.heap_read_typed (\<lambda>_. typeof_addr) heap_read P) heap_write P t xcphfrs \<longleftrightarrow> (ta, xcphfrs') \<in> JVM_heap_base.exec addr2thread_id thread_id2addr spurious_wakeups empty_heap allocate (\<lambda>_ :: 'heap. typeof_addr) heap_read heap_write P t xcphfrs \<and> (\<forall>ad al v T. ReadMem ad al v \<in> set \<lbrace>ta\<rbrace>\<^bsub>o\<^esub> \<longrightarrow> heap_base'.addr_loc_type TYPE('heap) typeof_addr P ad al T \<longrightarrow> heap_base'.conf TYPE('heap) typeof_addr P v T)"
